articles.description: It is both ironic and galling that they have lagged behind in both the physical and mental aspects of playing T20 cricket
articles.content: Rohit Sharma has attempted to raise the tempo of his game from the get-go, but it hasn't quite worked; KL Rahul has impressed in flashes but not consistently  •  AFP/Getty Images
